1.12.2.2.3.21: Added Russian language support file - See pull request #60
1.12.2.2.3.20: Cleaned up console spam - See pull request #56; Lag fix for Rider code - See pull request #57
1.12.2.2.3.19: Added config option to disable knockback damage from Wither - See issue #48
1.12.2.2.3.18: Merged Pull Request #47 - Improves zombie block breaking AI performance
1.12.2.2.3.17: Target Blocker Friendly Fire Crash - Fixes Issue #17; Blazes will no longer use flame touch effect on push attacker away unless Flame Touch is set to true in config.
1.12.2.2.3.16: Added blaze config features: set push damage when attacked; toggle item/block destruction on explosion death
1.12.2.2.3.15: Attempt to fix random gear swapping on player from other mods
1.12.2.2.3.13: Added enable/disable bat swarm config; Fixed bat swarm and DoT fog damage not being applied properly from config; Bosses can no longer despawn; Fixed fog color/density on player respawn; Added fog DoT player coughing; Added fog warning message time delay config
1.12.2.2.3.12: Added better logging for attribute erros (see issue #10); Added fully customizable poisonous boss fog; Added more bat swarm config options (health, damage, and attack range)
1.12.2.2.3.11: Crash fix for BossZombie.setPosition is abstract
1.12.2.2.3.10: Added config option to disable baby zombies from having equipment; Created new global equipment config options; Added config option to ignore spawn conditions when adding custom targets to mob
1.12.2.2.3.9: Added ability for mobs to attack other mobs (configurable); Added ability to disable baby zombie spawns (configurable); Created new global boss config options
1.12.2.2.3.8: Boss fog greatly improved; new config file needed
1.12.2.2.3.7: Improved boss fog for zombie bosses; Added new bat swarm attack to zombie bosses; Adde audio for bat swarm attack
1.12.2.2.3.6: Added colored fog around bosses (configurable); Added additional boss audio
1.12.2.2.3.5: Bug fix: console spam on removing entity
1.12.2.2.3.4: Boss mob spawn visual improvements; Boss mobs are now custom entities
1.12.2.2.3.3: Improved equipment and enchantment spawning; removed redundant full armor set chance
1.12.2.2.3.2: Fixed time bonus chance so time past the first day is calculated correctly; tweaked boss spawn sound
1.12.2.2.3.1: Mob spawning improvements; see change notes
1.12.2.2.3.0: Improved Equipment Spawning & Boss Warning Message Distance Config
1.12.2.2.2.9: Added chance for mob to spawn with full set of armor (based on equipment chance)
1.12.2.2.2.8: Zombie pigmen no longer target creative mode players; zombie pigmen should always target closest player.
1.12.2.2.2.7: Hopefully fixed an issue where dimension specific equipment was being given in the wrong dimensions
1.12.2.2.2.6: Fixed a crash on game load when Serene Seasons or Game Stages wasn't installed
1.12.2.2.2.5: Added Serene Seasons support; Added boss mob spawn chat warning (toggleable)
1.12.2.2.2.4: Fixed a crash related to new Zombie Pigmen aggression AI; rewrote the entire class using reflection
1.12.2.2.2.3: Added config to make zombie pigmen always aggressive, as well as set the range from player before attacking
1.12.2.2.2.2: Fixed a bug that caused crash on world load when Game Stages mod was not installed and a mob spawns.
1.12.2.2.2.1: GameStages support completed. Plus other spawn conditions such as dist from world, max height, player level, etc.
1.12.2.2.1.0: Initial support for GameStages added. Built against GameStages 2.0.117
1.12.2.2.0.17: Removed console debug output of equipment given to spawned skeletons and zombies.
1.12.2.2.0.16: Fixed Issue: Boss mobs would only spawn with normal equipment. Boss mobs now spawn with boss equipment as specified in the config file.
